document.full_text: carmelo anthony said that the knicks-celtics playoff series would be about more than just him and the celtics' paul pierce.
document.title: n.b.a. roundup: knicks' anthony insists it's a series, not a duel
lines_and_colors: carmelo anthony said that the knicks-celtics playoff series would be about more than just him and the celtics' paul pierce.
